name: WojSec
summary: Securing Unix servers to survive detailed auditing scrutiny.
short_description:
WojSec
Is a security application written in sh. This makes it extremely portable. It can be run right now on:

- AIX
- Linux


What it does:
- Check file permissions
- Check login security
- Check password securities and complexities
- Check user security
- etc

It adhere's strictly to the Federal Department of Defense UNIX security requirements.

If you run this script, you will pass the audit.

I've gone through the UNIX STIG many times, and have created this script based off my experiences.
